plot: In the continent of spooner, sorcerers, who are the continent's aristocrats, have begun to abuse their powers. Under the guidance of Big Momma (their boss) Carrot (who turns into a giant monster every time he's placed under a magic spell), Gateau (a bodybuilder), Marron (a mage), Chocolate and Tira (who can transform into dominatrix's at will) must stop the evil sorcerers from picking on the weak. However, none of them (except maybe Marron) have a clue to what’s going on.
opening_theme: "What's Up Guys?" by Shinnosuke Furumoto and Megumi Hayashibara
ending_theme: "Mask" by Masami Okui and Kasumi Matsumura
insert_song: "Mask" by Masami Okui and Kasumi Matsumura (ep 26)
"Mask" by Masami Okui and Kasumi Matsumura (ep 7)
